description: A look at the forthcoming jobs report numbers for August. Plus, immigrants in the U.S. who have lingering citizenship issues could lose the health benefits the gained under the Obamacare law.  Today is the deadline for those who received letters from government to submit any citizenship documents, or risk losing the benefits they purchased by the end of the month. We look at that issue, and others facing immigrants and non-English speakers under the law. Plus, Silicon Valley has a habit of letting employees choose their own titles. We take a closer look at the pros and cons of being able to call yourself a "princess."
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday September 5, 2014
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday September 5, 2014
byline: D Gorenstein, Stan Alcorn, Susanna Capelouto, Queena Kim and David Brancaccio
teaser: A look at the forthcoming jobs report numbers for August. Plus, immigrants in the U.S. who have lingering citizenship issues could lose the health benefits the gained under the Obamacare law.  Today is the deadline for those who received letters from government to submit any citizenship documents, or risk losing the benefits they purchased by the end of the month. We look at that issue, and others facing immigrants and non-English speakers under the law. Plus, Silicon Valley has a habit of letting employees choose their own titles. We take a closer look at the pros and cons of being able to call yourself a "princess."
